ohu 1818 di sudu adhirajyawadinta erehiwa athiwu karalle di giruwa paththuwen sambandha wu podu jana kandayamata nayakathwaya dun bawa sandahan we.me parapuren pawatha ena rajapakshawaru, mulgirigala, kondagala, nayigala saha kasagala parani bauddha siddhasthana saha piriwenwalin wata wu, buddiyagama pradhana kota gath gammana kihipayaka wikashaya wu athara 19 wani shathawarshaya agabhagaye di, ema parapure don dawith rajapaksha, marakada ihala walikada korale widanarachchi lesa, sudu adhirajyawadin saha adhirajyawadi gaththange akamaththen wuwada path karana ladi.
